Package watchface

Class ClockGui3

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
watchface.ClockGui3
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ClockGui3
extends javax.swing.JFrame
Creates a GUI Watchface with a clean style.

It extends the JFrame class.

Exit the rendered JFrame

See Also:

      public java.awt.Polygon buildPolygon​(int centerX, int centerY, int[] xp, int[] yp, double rotationAngle) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      public void drawPoly2​(java.awt.Graphics g, int centerX, int centerY, int[] xValues, int[] yValues, double rotationAngle, java.awt.Color color)

      centerY - coordinate y
